Params: {1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'Forget about how pitiful this thing is. Just your choice of color is... sigh.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha stares at the ribbon inside the mystery box. Dark green and intricately made, the ribbon has the words "α Lyrae" sewed at the end in silver.'}
{2: "I... didn't really know what was inside before you opened it.", 3: '8'}
{2: '(Explain Lyra and the cowherd and the weaver girl)', 3: '10'}
{2: 'α', 3: "That's why you're here looking for me today?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "I don't know what you were thinking, but I'd never be either one of them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "If there's something you want to protect, get stronger and take it back. Giving in to other people's rules won't get you anywhere.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What if I become one of them one day?', 3: '14'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'That day will never come if you choose to stay with me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "I will show you what I'll do if that day comes.", 4: '1'}
